trans-unit.source: Implements a serialization surrogate selector that allows one object to perform serialization and deserialization of another.
trans-unit.target: Implementa um seletor de substitutos de serialização que permite que um objeto para realizar a serialização e desserialização de outro.

trans-unit.source: Populates the provided <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the object.
trans-unit.target: Popula fornecido <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Extracts data from object `obj` and stores it in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Extrai dados de objeto `obj` e armazena no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> `info` parâmetro.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: Having located the surrogate, this method stores information on the object `obj` in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Após ter localizado do substituto, esse método armazena informações sobre o objeto `obj` no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> `info` parâmetro.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: This information describes its view of that object, including the object's fields, properties, and current values.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações descrevem a exibição do objeto, incluindo campos, propriedades e valores atuais do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> might correspond to the actual object, or it can be a synthesized view of the surrogate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>deve corresponder ao objeto real, ou pode ser uma exibição sintetizada do substituto.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: This method is protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é protegido por um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>para o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>com o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>especificado.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para popular com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino (consulte <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) desta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: O chamador não tem a permissão necessária.

trans-unit.source: Populates the object using the information in the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche o objeto usando as informações de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SetObjectData method is called during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: O método SetObjectData é chamado durante a desserialização.

trans-unit.source: With this method, you can take the empty <xref:System.Object>`obj` that has already been created, and enter <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>`info` data into that object.
trans-unit.target: Com esse método, você pode fazer vazio <xref:System.Object> `obj` que já foi criado e digite <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> `info` dados para esse objeto.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo></xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Constructors are not invoked during deserialization of information and reconstruction of the object.
trans-unit.target: Construtores não serão chamados durante a desserialização de informações e a reconstrução do objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é protegido por um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>para o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>com o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName>especificado.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object to populate.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para preencher.

trans-unit.source: The information to populate the object.
trans-unit.target: As informações para preencher o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The source from which the object is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: A origem da qual o objeto é desserializado.

trans-unit.source: The surrogate selector where the search for a compatible surrogate begins.
trans-unit.target: O seletor de substitutos onde começa a procurar um substituto compatível.

trans-unit.source: The populated deserialized object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto desserializado preenchido.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: O chamador não tem a permissão necessária.
